mapper.insert: insert into t_co_hlr_info (SCTNO_ID, SCTNO_CODE, SCTNO_TYPE_CD, REGN_CODE, HLR_BELG_CITY_CODE, BRUDRCT_CODE, VALID_TIME, PROV_CODE, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_TIME, CRT_APP_SYS_ID, MODF_USER_ID, MODF_TIME, MODF_APP_SYS_ID) values (#{sctnoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sctnoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sctnoTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hlrBelgCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brudrctCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crtAppSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modfUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modfTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modfAppSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_co_hlr_info set SCTNO_CODE = #{sctnoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCTNO_TYPE_CD = #{sctnoTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGN_CODE = #{regnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HLR_BELG_CITY_CODE = #{hlrBelgCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRUDRCT_CODE = #{brudrctCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_TIME = #{validTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROV_CODE = #{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_USER_ID = #{crtUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CRT_APP_SYS_ID = #{crtAppSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODF_USER_ID = #{modfUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODF_TIME = #{modfTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODF_APP_SYS_ID = #{modfAppSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SCTNO_ID = #{sctnoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select SCTNO_ID, SCTNO_CODE, SCTNO_TYPE_CD, REGN_CODE, HLR_BELG_CITY_CODE, BRUDRCT_CODE, VALID_TIME, PROV_CODE, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_TIME, CRT_APP_SYS_ID, MODF_USER_ID, MODF_TIME, MODF_APP_SYS_ID from t_co_hlr_info where SCTNO_ID = #{sctnoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select SCTNO_ID, SCTNO_CODE, SCTNO_TYPE_CD, REGN_CODE, HLR_BELG_CITY_CODE, BRUDRCT_CODE, VALID_TIME, PROV_CODE, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_TIME, CRT_APP_SYS_ID, MODF_USER_ID, MODF_TIME, MODF_APP_SYS_ID from t_co_hlr_info
select PROV_CODE from t_co_hlr_info where SCTNO_CODE = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
